definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: She fell and bruised her knees.
sentences.chinese: 她摔了一跤，膝盖跌得乌青。

sentences.english: She fell over and hurt her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她摔了一跤，膝盖跌得乌青。

sentences.english: She tripped over which made her knees black and blue.
sentences.chinese: 她摔了一跤，膝盖跌得乌青。

sentences.english: While WuQing to face high dimensional yue wheelchair, clutching the grass.
sentences.chinese: 高维岳则脸色乌青地坐在轮椅里，紧紧搂着小草。

sentences.english: He fell, and bruised his face.
sentences.chinese: 他摔了一跤，脸摔得乌青。

sentences.english: My knee of right leg swelled a big lump of bruise.
sentences.chinese: 我的右脚膝盖上，乌青乌青的肿了一大块。

sentences.english: My knee of right leg swelled a big lump of bruise.
sentences.chinese: 我的右脚膝盖上，乌青乌青的肿了一大块。

definition: to be badly mangled or mutilated (idiom)
to be drenched with blood/dripping blood
variant of 紅彤彤|红彤彤[hong2 tong1 tong1]
wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
trace/impression (e.g. footprint)/abbr. of 印子錢|印子钱[yin4 zi5 qian2], usury
